articles.image_title: The Breitling Orbiter 3 balloon rises high above Chateau D'Oex in the Swiss Alp after being launched Monday 1st March 1999. On board the silver helium balloon are Bertrand Piccard of Switzerland and Brian Jones of Great Britain who are finally getting underway after three months of waiting for the right weather conditions. This is their third attempt tocircumnavigate the globe non-stop. dpa +++ dpa-Bildfunk +++
